short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily download images from various websites with a single click.
short.zh_CN: 轻松一键从多种网站下载图片。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPTBLOX - Image Downloader is your go-to Chrome extension for effortlessly downloading images from a variety of websites. Whether you're a designer, developer, or just someone who loves collecting images, this tool is designed to streamline your experience. With just a single click, you can download selected or all images from a webpage. Advanced features like bulk download, image preview, and website-specific customization further enhance its capabilities.
long.zh_CN: GPTBLOX - Image Downloader是您的首选 Chrome 扩展程序，用于轻松地从各种网站下载图片。无论您是设计师、开发者，还是喜欢收集图片的普通用户，该工具都旨在简化您的体验。仅需单击一下，就可以从网页下载所选或所有图片。批量下载、图片预览和特定于网站的自定义等高级功能进一步增强了其功能。
